articles.description: The outspoken studio host pulled no punches, calling Minnesota "dumber than rocks" after blowing a 26-point lead in Game 3 of their series with Memphis.
articles.content:
MINNEAPOLIS Losing a swing playoff game after blowing a 26-point lead - yep, 26 points - is painful enough. 
But things actually got worse for the Minnesota Timberwolves, whose blown lead in Thursda… [+2595 chars]
